name: 吳斯偉
objective:
本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.
schedule: 經營管理及財務管理相關個案研討
scorePolicy:
出席 + 課堂討論 50%
小組報告 50%
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）

name: 陳建丞
objective:
在管理決策中，要如何做行銷管理才能使得公司的產品賣得出去並增加公司收入。要如何做資金管理才能使得公司可以正常營運並將資金做適當的管理決策配置。透過國內外相關公司案例的討論，讓學生可以瞭解消費者行為、市場區隔、產品策略、通路、數位 (含 AI) 行銷等議題，以及對財管的投資、融資、營運資金、公司理財等議題有進一步的理解，讓高階經理人可以有更全面的策略營運方針。
In management decisions, how should marketing management be conducted to ensure that a company's products sell and increase company revenue? How should financial management be handled to ensure the company operates smoothly and makes appropriate management decisions regarding the allocation of funds? Through discussions of relevant domestic and international company cases, students can gain an understanding of topics such as consumer behavior, market segmentation, product strategy, distribution channels, and digital (including AI) marketing, as well as develop a deeper understanding of financial management topics like investment, financing, working capital, and corporate finance. This will enable senior managers to develop more comprehensive strategic operational guidelines.
schedule: 經營管理相關議題討論
scorePolicy:
上課互動與討論 70%
期末報告 30%
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）
